chapters.title: Chapter 9: Blood in the Air
chapters.info: Blaeric Negina, p. 165—One of Joline's Warders. He has blue eyes, a pointed chin, and straight black hair. He is tall, and from Shienar. He shaved his topknot to avoid drawing attention from the Seanchan; it is now growing back in. Mat thinks it looks like a badger's tail glued to his head. See also Maza, Joline; Mizar, Fen.
